Package server.ai.pathfinding

Class NodeGrid

java.lang.Object
server.ai.pathfinding.NodeGrid
public class NodeGrid
extends java.lang.Object
A node representation of a 2d grid. A NodeGrid contains a 2d array of nodes as well as a 2 length array of the dimensions of the grid ( [xLength, yLength]
Author:
Daniel Batchford

  • Constructor Details

    • NodeGrid

      public NodeGrid​(int[] dimensions) throws PathFindingException
      Parameters:
      dimensions - the dimensions of the 2d grid in form [xLength, yLength]
      Throws:
      PathFindingException - Thrown if dimensions are invalid or null

  • Method Details

    • setWalkable

      public void setWalkable​(int[] cord, boolean walkable)
      Parameters:
      cord - The 2 length int array representing a coordinate, in form [x,y]
      walkable - Whether this node should be walkable

    • getDimensions

      public int[] getDimensions()

    • getNeighbors

      public java.util.List<Node> getNeighbors​(Node node, boolean useWrapped)
      Returns the neighbors of a Node in a NodeGrid. If useWrapped is used, edge squares return squares on the opposing side.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to fetch neighbors for
      useWrapped - Whether to consider edge wrapping
      Returns:
      A list of the manhattan neighbors of the input node.

    • getNodes

      public Node[][] getNodes()
